character.statement: If you're trying to find the science fair, it's over at the school.
I hear there's an amazing new project at the science fair!

exchange.question: Have you seen C.J.?
exchange.answer: I've been out here all day. I saw C.J. leave, but never saw her come back.

character.statement: The science fair should be awesome this year!
Glad to hear that C.J. is ok!

exchange.question: Is C.J. in her apartment?
exchange.answer: I thought I saw someone in C.J.'s apartment earlier, but when I knocked on the door, no one answered!
